      public boolean revealRumourCard(RumourCard cardToReveal)
      Reveal a Rumour card. This method reveal the chosen card from the player hand and call its effects.
      Parameters:
      cardToReveal - card to reveal
      Returns:
      whether the card has been used successfully or not
